title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; no API keys needed, runs entirely local.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama for quick chatting and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and delete models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface for chat, completion, and embeddings.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with GPU support, WebUI, and Open-WebUI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, completion, and embeddings via REST.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing local LLM calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with strongly typed models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in any channel.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for Ollama; mention the bot to chat or configure different models per channel.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.
